column4: I laugh because I did it once myself - 20 years ago, on a SunOS box.
I was told to try to take ownership of my home folder to try to fix my logging in problem
AFAIK, the only solution to that problem is "recover from most recent backup"
not even a big deal right now
ubuntu is like a really hard game to me. I keep trying over and over, and each time I get further
but I keep dying and have to restart the level
I think MOST of my issues relate to my gpu >:U
I keep trying to make my gpu work right, and I keep breaking the whole OS
I have a solution to that one for you
Ah. Well, probably not your favorite suggestion, then :)
I've been using *nix without X for almost 25 years - it's great
